description.narrative: (i) Support access to finance to agricultural SMEs, mostly of these family-owned businesses, which have traditionally been underserved due to high perceived risks; (ii) Positive impact on rural communities in the region; in FY15 LAAD supported 291 projects in 14 countries which created over 9,000 new jobs; and (iii) Support to a unique and very successful business model which has consistently grown in a financially and developmentally sustainable way.

Proposed investment consists of long-term loan to Latin American Agribusiness Development Corporation S.A. (LAAD or the Company) and its fully owned subsidiary LAAD Americas N.V. to support growth of its portfolio of medium and long-term loans to agribusiness SMEs in Latin America and the Caribbean (LAC).
